events.message: The candidate has successfully submitted their application for the software engineer role, demonstrating strong interest and relevant experience.
After reviewing the application, it was categorised under Engineering due to keywords like software developer and experience in DevOps.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to manage this candidate's recruitment process for the engineering position.
The initial screening call was successful; the candidate demonstrated clear knowledge about software development and DevOps practices.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering team to assess the candidate’s coding skills and system design abilities.
The technical interview was completed successfully, with the candidate solving complex problems and explaining their reasoning clearly.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidate's cultural fit and employment expectations.
The HR interview went well with the candidate expressing enthusiasm for the company culture and long-term growth opportunities.
A formal offer has been proposed to the candidate for the software engineering position, including salary and benefits details.
The candidate has accepted the offer enthusiastically and is looking forward to starting the new role in the coming month.
The candidate’s onboarding process has started with orientation sessions and IT setup scheduled for their first day.
The hiring process is officially closed as the candidate has fully onboarded and is now actively contributing to the engineering team.
